name: DoubleSidedUpgrades
description: Adds a chance for upgrades to be double sided, giving both a positive and negative effect. Use dami-ModOptions to customize the chances and multipliers for the effects.

DOUBLE_SIDED_UPGRADE_CHANCE.description: The probability of an upgrade being double sided. Default is 50%.

GLOBAL_UPGRADE_MULT.description: Global multiplier for all upgrade effects. Default is 100%.

POSITIVE_UPGRADE_MULT.description: Multiplier for the positive effect of double sided upgrades. Default is 200%.

NEGATIVE_UPGRADE_MULT.description: Multiplier for the negative effect of double sided upgrades. Default is -100%.

CURSED_UPGRADE.description: If true, cursed upgrades can appear. Only effective if DLC is enabled. Default is false.
